item.title: json: unmarshal custom date formats
item.description: When we are building a JSON API, many times we have to deal with dates that we can’t have control of the layout.

item.title: Variadic functions in Go
item.description: Variadic functions allows you to have a variable number of arguments. Let’s see how.
